heading: HB03544
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM TO PROCESS AND TO PAY CLAIMS OF LEGITIMATE CLAIMANTS AND BENEFICIARIES WITHIN THIRTY (30) DAYS UPON FULL SUBMISSION OF ALL NECESSARY APPLICATION DOCUMENTS THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03544
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM TO PROCESS AND TO PAY CLAIMS OF LEGITIMATE CLAIMANTS AND BENEFICIARIES WITHIN THIRTY (30) DAYS UPON FULL SUBMISSION OF ALL NECESSARY APPLICATION DOCUMENTS THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-09-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform

      1. Deliberated by the TWG on 2016-10-19
          -TWG on measures proposing amendments to both SSS and GSIS, chaired by Rep. Mariño
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
